verses.verse: And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7251>foursquare:<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> thereof: his <S%H7161>horns<s%> shall be of the same: and you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H5518>pans<s%> to <S%H1878>receive<s%> his <S%H1878>ashes,<s%> and his <S%H3257>shovels,<s%> and his <S%H4219>basins,<s%> and his meat <S%H4207>hooks,<s%> and his fire <S%H4289>pans:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for it a <S%H4345>grate<s%> of <S%H4639>network<s%> <S%H7568><s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> and on the <S%H7568>net<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7098>corners<s%> thereof.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3749>compass<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> that the <S%H7568>net<s%> may be even to the <S%H2677>middle<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And the <S%H905>staves<s%> shall be <S%H935>put<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> shall be on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.
<S%H5014>Hollow<s%> with <S%H3871>boards<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> it: as it was <S%H7200>showed<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall they <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle:<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> there shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> of an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6285>side:<s%>

And the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof and their <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> shall be of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> shall be of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And <S%H3651>likewise<s%> for the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> in <S%H753>length<s%> there shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> cubits <S%H753>long,<s%> and his <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And for the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6235>ten.<s%>
And the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of one <S%H3802>side<s%> of the gate shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

And on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> shall be <S%H7050>hangings<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits: their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

And for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be an <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> worked with <S%H7551>needlework:<s%> and their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> shall be <S%H702>four,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H702>four.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be <S%H2836>filleted<s%> with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> shall be an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> where, and the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3489>pins<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> shall be of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> you <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> to cause the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>always.<s%>

In the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6186>order<s%> it from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to their <S%H1755>generations<s%> on the <S%H854>behalf<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
